products.name: MAPL Premium Besan | High Quality Gram Flour for Cooking & Sweets
products.description: MAPL Premium Besan (Gram Flour) is a finely milled, high-quality flour made from carefully selected chana dal to ensure superior taste, texture, and purity. Processed under strict quality control and hygienic conditions by Mahashakti Agro Products Pvt. Ltd., our besan delivers consistent freshness and rich aroma in every pack. Ideal for traditional Indian dishes like pakoras, sweets, kadhi, and savory snacks, MAPL Besan is rich in protein, gluten-free, and packed with natural nutrients. Suitable for household kitchens, restaurants, and bulk commercial use, it is available in secure packaging to maintain long-lasting freshness and quality.

categories.name: Mustard Oil

products.name: MAPL Kachchi Ghani Mustard Oil | Cold Pressed Pure Mustard Oil | Traditional Extraction Method
products.description: MAPL Kachchi Ghani Mustard Oil is a premium cold-pressed mustard oil, extracted using traditional Kachchi Ghani methods to retain its natural aroma, rich flavor, and nutritional goodness. Manufactured by Mahashakti Agro Products Pvt. Ltd., this oil delivers purity you can trust for everyday cooking and traditional Indian recipes. Made from carefully selected mustard seeds, MAPL Kachchi Ghani Mustard Oil is 100% pure, chemical-free, and vegetarian, making it an excellent choice for health-conscious households and commercial kitchens. Its strong aroma and authentic taste make it especially ideal for Indian cooking, pickles, frying, and sautéing. Packed in bulk-friendly containers, this edible oil is suitable for homes, hotels, restaurants, caterers, and wholesalers seeking premium quality mustard oil.
